reassignment of product categories Reassign Product Category by Product Category
section.para: To reassign Product Categories by Product Category, select the "Reassign Product Category by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Reassign Product Category by Product Category

section.para: When reassigning Product Categories by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify Product Category you want to change.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Specify the new Product Category you want to assign the old Product Category to.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Select to reassign the specified Product Category, using the specified parameters.
